title: Krauthamer on NA and image of Gopher John - claim

content.question: Which of the following claims can be supported by Source 2?

choices.label: Indigenous nations enslaved people but only for domestic work inside of their homes.
Indigenous nations practiced slavery that was more brutal than that of white enslavers.
Indigenous nations enslaved people using many of the same justifications as white enslavers.
Indigenous nations did not allow their enslaved laborers to buy their freedom.

content.answer: Indigenous nations enslaved people using many of the same justifications as white enslavers.
